text: Öebbi d tafat n tmurt akked igenwan. Amedya n tafat iS d takwap degs taftilt. Taftilt daxel n tqeôâap. Taqeôâap, amzun d itri acôaôaq, tecâal it ttejôa iôqan, tazemmurt ur nelli n ugmuv ne$ n utaram. Qôib a pfet zzit is, ur p tennul tmes. Tafat $ef tafat. Ippawi Öebbi win i S ihwan ar tafat iS. Ippak ed Öebbi imedyaten i medden. Öebbi Iéôa yal cci
